Defs:
HVMP_SafeInvestment safe investment Use the targeted silver or gold stack to invest in an opportunity which the Commerce Branch assures is guaranteed to have a positive - if minor - return. You will receive the return 5 days from now. HautsFramework.RoyalTitlePermitWorker_MultiplyItemStack HVMP_CommerceI HVMP_CommerceBranch 1 10 false (0,0)
2
Silver
Gold
HVMP_TargetCurrency 1.1~1.4 true 300000 HVMP_InvestmentReturns HVMP_InvestmentMade
HVMP_RiskyInvestment risky investment Use the targeted silver or gold stack to make a volatile investment, which may result in a negative or positive (possibly very positive) return. You will receive the return 5 days from now. HautsFramework.RoyalTitlePermitWorker_MultiplyItemStack HVMP_CommerceI HVMP_CommerceBranch 1 10 false (0,1)
2
Silver
Gold
HVMP_TargetCurrency 0.5~2.5 true 300000 HVMP_InvestmentReturns HVMP_InvestmentMade

HVMP_DesertionBribe desertion bribe Tempt the target enemy with a Commerce Branch-backed lucrative offer in exchange for their immediate hasty retreat.\n\nOnly works on enemies. Those who lack human-level intelligence or are in a mental break cannot be targeted. HautsPermits.RoyalTitlePermitWorker_Retreat HVMP_CommerceIII HVMP_CommerceBranch 1 12 false (2,0)
2
HVMP_TargetDesertion ExecuteTrade HVMP_Desertion
HVMP_RecruitmentBribe recruitment bribe Tempt the target prisoner with a Commerce Branch-backed lucrative offer in exchange for their cooperation. This reduces resistance by 15, but can't recruit the target.\n\nMentally broken prisoners cannot be targeted. HautsPermits.RoyalTitlePermitWorker_Recruit HVMP_CommerceIII HVMP_CommerceBranch 1 12 false (2,1)
2
HVMP_TargetRecruitment ExecuteTrade -15 HVMP_Recruitment
HVMP_CallDropPods signal cargo pods Arrange for someone to look the other way while resource-containing drop pods conveniently misfire and land near your location. HautsFramework.RoyalTitlePermitWorker_GenerateQuest HVMP_CommerceV HVMP_CommerceBranch 1 10 false (3,0)
2
ResourcePodCrash
1
HVMP_CallRaidMinor signal minor raid Get the Commerce Branch to lure a small group of raiders, either by showing them impartial records of your wealth, or faking them if you're poor. They will arrive within 1-2 days. HautsPermits.RoyalTitlePermitWorker_CallRaid HVMP_CommerceV HVMP_CommerceBranch 1 15 false (4,0)
2
RaidEnemy
false 60000~120000 25~750 1
HVMP_FlashInvestment flash investment Use the targeted silver or gold stack to make an extremely volatile, time-sensitive investment, which may result in a negative or positive (possibly extremely positive) return. 3
